sense.def:
Mourning
je vedenje, s katerim človek pokaže, da je žalosten zaradi smrti neke osebe.

seg.quote: Beards were shaved off as a sign of mourning.

sense.def:
Človek je
in mourning
, kadar nosi posebna oblačila ali se vede na določen način zato, ker mu je umrl sorodnik.

seg.quote: He was in mourning for his wife.
